Notes: Letters, papers, church school, business, and genealogical books and records, 1920 census records, oral histories, maps, photographs, and newspaper; furniture, quilts, farm tools, archaeological objects, and American Indian artifacts. Herb Garden and Butterfly Garden, Path of Gold Garden, Civil War relics, and Coats and Clark Thread Mill exhibit.  Scrapbooks and filing cabinet of articles about Powder Springs and surrounding area.
